titleStmt.title: The lovers logick: or, logical-love Compos'd in French by Monsieur de Callieres junior. And now newly translated into English. Licensed Sep. 21 1669. Roger L'Estrange.
titleStmt.author: Callières, Monsieur de (François de), 1645-1717.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for George Palmer at the Black Spread Eagle without Temple-Bar,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
